doc:
Carol Forman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carol_Forman 0 Carol Forman (19 June 1918, Epes, Alabama – 9 July 1997, Burbank, California) was an American actress best known for playing exotic villains in action serials, particularly Spider Lady in the 1948 Superman serial, as well as Sombra, the lead villainess in the 1947 Republic serial The Black Widow. She also made guest appearances on The Cisco Kid starring Duncan Renaldo and Leo Carillo in the early 1950s. Carol_Forman ( 19_June_1918 , Epes , Alabama – 9_July_1997 , Burbank , California ) was an_American_actress best_known for playing exotic_villains in action_serials , particularly Spider_Lady in the_1948_Superman_serial , as_well_as Sombra , the_lead_villainess in the_1947_Republic_serial The_Black_Widow . She also made guest_appearances on The_Cisco_Kid starring Duncan_Renaldo and Leo_Carillo in the_early_1950s .
